properties.description:
- 증분 적재시, 전달+현재 달 파일 Delete후 새로 생성
- 증분컬럼이 YYYYMMDD 형태
- Copy data Current Month > Source > Query 변경 필요
- Copy data Previous Month > Source > Query 변경 필요

oracleReaderQuery.value:
SELECT *
  FROM CD_WMS.IFWMSONLINE_BO
 WHERE SHIPPING_DATE >= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'MM'),'YYYYMMDD')
   AND SHIPPING_DATE <= TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'MM')),'YYYYMMDD');

SELECT *
  FROM CD_WMS.IFWMSONLINE_BO
 WHERE SHIPPING_DATE >= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'),'YYYYMMDD')
   AND SHIPPING_DATE <= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE-1),'YYYYMMDD');
@concat('SELECT DISTINCT(SUBSTR(', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ', 1, 6)) CALMONTH FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceSchema, '.', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable, ' WHERE SYSTEM_TYPE = ''ER''')

@concat('SELECT * FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceSchema, '.', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable,' WHERE SYSTEM_TYPE = ''ER''', ' AND SUBSTR(',pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ', 1, 6) = ', item().CALMONTH)

SELECT *
  FROM CD_WMS.IFWMSONLINE
 WHERE SYSTEM_TYPE = 'ER'
   AND SHIPPING_DATE >= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'MM'),'YYYYMMDD')
   AND SHIPPING_DATE <= TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'MM')),'YYYYMMDD');

SELECT *
  FROM CD_WMS.IFWMSONLINE
 WHERE SYSTEM_TYPE = 'ER'
   AND SHIPPING_DATE >= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'),'YYYYMMDD')
   AND SHIPPING_DATE <= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE-1),'YYYYMMDD');

source.oracleReaderQuery:
SELECT BID_ID
          ,MAX(ITEM_FILE_NAME) AS ITEM_FILE_NAME
     FROM  RPA_ODS.RPA_D2B 
     GROUP BY BID_ID

oracleReaderQuery.value:
select
       a.sno
      ,a.channel 
      ,replace(replace(replace(regexp_replace(contents, '<[^>]*>|\&([^;])*;', ''), chr(10), '//LF//'), chr(13), '//LF//'), '"','＂') contents 
      ,a.goodsno
      ,a.ordergoodsno
      ,a.regdt
      ,a.moddt
      ,b.goodscd
from cd_beston.es_plusReviewArticle a
    ,cd_beston.es_goods b
where  a.goodsno = b.GOODSNO(+)
